Articles.Content:
Its been awhile since I've updated my thread here, so i thought hey, lets give that a go! I tend to focus heavily on aircraft of various sorts, not because I dont like rockets, but because I like planes more. Anyways, ask any questions you like about my planes but to head off a few:

*all fly

*all fly reasonably well in fact

*all were designed for FAR

*some are unintentionally space-planes, or can achieve orbit where their RL counterparts cannot.

*yes, I have a flying landing pad, and yes I landed on it mid-air. tehe.

These are a couple of my newest works based around the idea of sea landings in order to drop submarines for various activities. Additionally they could drop bombs... The first craft is probably the most practical, and weighs in at 84t with a full load of kerosene, the second two weigh in at 337t and 268t respectively, both with full fuel.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

cookies to those who can name the real ones below!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I would also enjoy trying to build by request as well, so if you don't see something you'd like to let me know! Thanks for checking out my craft!

Edited March 28, 2014 by Dirt_Merchant
updates
VERY VERY nice I love them. If you are taking requests can I see a skylon SSTO? or if there is one in the album sorry I missed it.
Damn man... Just... Damn, those look so COOL!

Some very nice crafts in there. Well done!

I like that you've made a Virgin Galactic replica, too!

I am looking for a Space shuttle design using of course FAR but as for parts, the B9 Aerospace, shuttle engines pack, and possibly procedural wings. I am not too worried about the launcher, I could do that myself, but I am having trouble with the shuttle design. Needs to be very stable and able to glide very easily while still having a decent range in atmosphere should I need to have a somewhat powered decent. Something to give an idea of what I am looking for is the NASA Endeavour Space Shuttle.

If you need any more information for my request feel free to message me or reply to this
name of the cockpit mods you used? really like the f-16 and the other weird stealth looking cockpit you have great stuff!

Thanks alot guys for your feedback! its always nice to hear compliments on one's work;)

@spaceman1999: yessir, I have indeed included some skylon like designs in previous showcases, though due to my imgur image count limits they have since fallen off my account I believe. I have used the wingtip mounted engine, canard layouts to great success though for many ssto operations. And the sky was broken in an older version of RSS.

@trollkowski: the jet fighter like cockpits are from Nazari's mysterious projects pack, and are quite amazing iva view, especially with RPM

@Bulletrhli: Man just shoot me a pm with requirements, or alternatively get back on klf, there are still a good number of us hanging out on klf.
